group_1.textCenter: A-about the strategy for our next battle…
I-I'd appreciateー I'd appreciate it a lot@if you could give me some advice, Rui…

group_1.narration: Indeed,@just when we thought our long struggle had ended@and the people were at peace…@The gods have issued a new challenge.
Fate will not allow me,@the reincarnation of the Supreme Overlord,@to rest in peace.
Keh-heh-heh…@It begins anew, doesn't it?@That blood-drenched festival…!@※Kamiket is over,@but I'm excited for the next event that's coming up.
My, my…@And you are unafraid of seeking knowledge from I,@Fortress The Wizard…?@※Do you want me to help you out, then?

group_1.textLeft: …E-excuse me, um… Rui?@I can't hear you…
Do you have a bad connection…?

group_1.textRight: …Oh, sorry.@I was just thinking about something…

group_1.textLeft: I-I see…!
F-for someー For some reason…
I can post in the chat just fine,@but calls make me n-nervous…

group_1.textRight: …Yeah, I get that…
…The first time we met in-person at an event,
you seemed like you were going to pass out…

group_1.textLeft: I'm reallyー I'm really sorry about that…

group_1.textRight: …Nah, don't worry about it…@I was nervous too…

group_1.textLeft: A-anyway, anyway!
It's so, so nice to have a Kamiket regular like you
help me prepare for the upcoming convention…!

group_1.narration: Let me explain!@Kamiket is a large-scale fan convention@in Kamihama's Minaminagi Ward.
The next event coming up is smaller,@but it's still relatively big.
Accompanying me is Miyuri,@who I've met at several events before.@A fellow follower of the creator MacQueen.
She's not used to going to events,@so I'll be giving her pointers as a veteran.

group_1.textRight: (It's sorta embarrassing to have a younger girl@looking up to me… Ehehe.)

group_1.textLeft: U-um, excuse me, Rui…?@Are you thinking again…?

group_1.textRight: O-oh… Sorry, I got nervous…@I kinda clammed up…

group_1.textLeft: I-I understand, I understand.@I-I've got social anxiety too…
(But, but for me, I think it might make it@a little easier to talk to someone)
(if I know they're more nervous than I am…!)

group_1.textRight: …So, Miyuri, this is your first time@at a large-scale convention…isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah!@I've only ever been to smaller conventions.
Until now, I could just memorize the circles@I wanted to visit.
This is the first time I've gone somewhere so big@I need to make a circle checklist…
I-if you hadn't taught me,
I never would've known circle checklists existed@in the first place!
I didn'tー I didn't imagine even regular participants@would have to go through all this trouble…

group_1.textRight: …Thinking about it that way,
participating in a circle@is an immeasurable hardship of the gods…

group_1.textLeft: It is, it is!
Speaking of gods, I heard the great MacQueen@is gonna be there this time!

group_1.textRight: …!@[wait:0.8][chara:305601:cheek_1][chara:305601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:305601:lipSynch_1]Yeah, you're right…

group_1.narration: "At last,@the long-awaited collection of setting materials@for the series "Bible of the End" is coming out,@and there's already a lot of discussion@about the contents."
"According to the official announcement,@it's going to feature brand-new art,@and there are rumours that there might be a preview@for the next installment."

group_1.textRight: My heart's been racing since the day it got@announced…
…Oh, sorry…@I got carried away and started rambling…

group_1.textLeft: No, no,@this feels more like the "you" in our chat room.
Besides, besides! I understand the excitement!
I like MacQueen's games too, of course,
but I'm more about the visuals,
so I'm really grateful for this collection!

group_1.textRight: …Yeah, good point.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, right, right! I have a problem!
There are so many circles I wanna check out,@I'll never be able to get to all of them!

group_1.textRight: Ah…

group_1.textLeft: For-for starters, why is this map so complicated?!
It's a big jumble of letters and numbers and…

group_1.textRight: It's more like a map of a sanctuary@with the locations of hidden treasure marked on it.
It burns, doesn't it…? Heh heh.

group_1.textLeft: Did you say something?

group_1.textRight: N-nope, not a word.
…Sounds like there are a lot of creators@you're a fan of, Miyuri…

group_1.textLeft: For sure, for sure!
I'm going for circles with great depictions of legs.
It's such a big area,@and the genres I like are all over the place…
That can't be helped since I keep finding@more creators I like, though…
On that note, on that note!
Apparently one of my favorite cosplayers is gonna@be there too!
If we also go by the cosplay zone,@we're not gonna have enough time…!

group_1.textRight: Ah, you've mentioned her before.@She's famous with some groups as…

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…@The goddess of gorgeous legs, Lady Venus!

group_1.narration: "She never forgets to respect the original work@with her costumes.@That's the heart and soul of cosplay!"
"After all, you can't talk about her@without mentioning her legs!@Slim, but not without meat!@Well-maintained pale skin@with just the right amount of muscle!@Their splendor is beyond words…!"
"I want everyone to share in the beauty of her legs!"

group_1.textRight: …Is that…so…
(Aaagh… This hurts!)
(It's like I'm being shown my old self; it's painful!)
(I guess this is what people with niche interests)
(must look like to outsiders…)

group_1.textLeft: …What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: …Well, we've all got our own likes and dislikes.
My own tastes are probably kinda…out there too.
…I dunno, there are a lot of things like that@that aren't for everyone.
…As in, maybe you shouldn't talk about legs@too much in public…

group_1.textLeft: You think so?

group_1.textRight: …Yeah. I hide a lot of stuff from the crowd too, but…
I don't think people would really "get" what you're@trying to say…

group_1.textLeft: (Even Lady San scolds me for that all the time…)
Got it, Rui! Thank you so much for the advice!

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about it… If you need anything else,@you can always hit up the chat…
…Now then, I'll see you on the battlefield.
